name: Kitchen
longDes: You enter what seems to be a kitchen. You can faintly smell the aroma of freshly-baked bread. There are large doors to the North and East leading to adjoining rooms. Along the North wall, there is a large sink with a window above it. There is also a row of drawers along the Northern wall next to the Range. Just as you finish a quick survey of the room, you notice something (or someone) move in the corner of your eye. Itâ€™s rapidly moving towards you!
shortDes: You are in the Mansion's kitchen. The door to the North goes to the Rose Garden. The door to the East is the formal Dining Room.
